casebody.data:
Sumner L. SAMUELS, Plaintiff, v. E. F. DREW & CO., Inc., Defendant. In the Matter of the Claim of John F. CONWAY against the Receiver or Receivers of E. F. Drew & Co., Inc., Claimant Appellant. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 4, 1925. No. 322. See, also, 286 F. 278, 281. Poore & Webster, of New York City (John G. Poore, of New York City, of counsel) , for appellant. Lowenthal, Szold & Perkins, of New York City (Maxwell Brandwene and Malcolm P. Sharp, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and MAN-TON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM. Order [7 F.(2d) 764] affirmed.
